# rRPC (LLM context)

Repository: schema-first RPC code generator for JSON-over-HTTP APIs.

## What it does
- Parses `.rrpc` schema files (models + RPCs).
- Generates Go servers and clients, Python clients, and OpenAPI specs.
- Provides a small DSL with types: `string`, `int`, `bool`, `json`, `raw`, `list[T]`, `map[T]`, and optional `?`.

## Key directories
- `internal/lexer`, `internal/parser`: schema parsing and validation.
- `internal/gen/go`, `internal/gen/python`, `internal/gen/openapi`: generators and templates.
- `cmd/`: CLI commands (`server`, `client`, `openapi`, `debug`).
- `examples/` and `integration_test/`: example schemas and test harness.

## Core docs
- `docs/docs.md` (index)
- `docs/schema_language.md`
- `docs/protocol.md`
- `docs/go.md`
- `docs/python.md`
- `docs/errors.md`

## Common commands
- Build CLI: `go build`
- Generate Go server: `rRPC server -o . schema.rrpc`
- Generate Python client: `rRPC client -o . schema.rrpc`
- Generate Go client: `rRPC client --lang go -o . schema.rrpc`
- OpenAPI: `rRPC openapi -o . schema.rrpc`
- Integration tests: `python integration_test/run_tests.py`

## Examples
- Hello world: `examples/hello_world/hello.rrpc`
- Text demo: `examples/text/text.rrpc`
